title: Flickr Data Breach Exposes 35 Million Users After Third-Party Email Vendor Compromised
tags: Substack Confirms Data Breach: 697,000 User Records Exposed Including Email Addresses and Phone NumbersThe popular newsletter platform Substack has confirmed a significant data breach that exposed the personal information of hundreds of thousands of users.
